text: soba noodles are staple and Japanese
cooking made with buckwheat flour the
protein-packed noodles have a nutty
taste in a slightly chewy texture
perfect for a lunchbox Asian noodle
salad we toss it with crisp green beans
and silky pieces of tofu and flavor it
with just a little bit of soy sauce and
lime juice nutritious and delicious our
Asian noodle salad is the perfect
lunchtime meal first
trim the ends off of 8 ounces of green
beans and then cut them into 2-inch
pieces perfect I've got a big pot of
boiling water give it a good amount of
salt the green beans will only need
about four minutes to become crisp and
tender tofu is sometimes called bean
curd and it's made from soy milk we love
tofu because of its delicate flavor and
its high level of protein you'll need
six ounces cut into cubes drain them on
paper towels to remove any excess liquid
the green beans are bright green and
tender but still crisp once you've
removed them bring the water back up to
a boil and cook your soba noodles about
6 ounces for the dressing I'll whisk
three tablespoons of lime juice
two tablespoons of soy sauce and 2
teaspoons of toasted sesame oil just a
small amount adds that rich sesame
flavor that we all love in Asian food
half of this dressing should go over the
tofu the noodles are tender so drain
them well and add them directly to the
remaining dressing in the bowl add your
green beans and two minced scallions we
like to sprinkle the dressed tofu right
on top of the dressed noodles that way
they don't fall apart when you're mixing
your salad this is a really versatile
salad you could eat it warm or room
temperature or keep it in the fridge for
tomorrow need it in your lunch in many
Asian cultures long noodle symbolize
long life our healthy Asian noodle salad
is so easy to make and delicious to eat
that it'll become a longtime staple in
your everyday cooking hi guys thanks for
watching this video be sure to click
here if you want to subscribe and click
over here if you want to continue
watching more great videos like this
